title: external modules
extract: A single javascript file is a module when you work with NodeJS, RequireJS or System. The way you define external modules is also very different from the internal module syntax. You don't use the module syntax. Instead you define things in your file.Feb 7, 2016
extract_html: A single javascript file is a module when you work with NodeJS, RequireJS or System. The way you define external modules is also very different from the internal module syntax. You don't use the module syntax. Instead you define things in your file.Feb 7, 2016
